body:
[Resonance]: Shivers are sent down your spine, as you feel the presence of something ancient and powerful. The air is thick with the scent of decay and the sound of whispers fills your ears. You feel a pull towards the darkness, as if something is calling you to it. You can't help but feel a sense of dread, as you realize that you are not alone in this cryptic place. 

[1]: [Proceed] 
[2]: [Stand still] 
[3]: "This is pointless, isn't it?"
title: Start1

body:
[Resonance]: You take a step forward, resistance is pointless, and the whispers grow louder. The darkness seems to envelop you, and you feel as if you are being watched. 

[1]: [Accept your fate] 
[2]: [Close your eyes]
title: Next

body:
[Clairvoyance]: You close your eyes, for exactly four seconds, and when you open them, you find yourself in a different place. The darkness is gone, and you are standing in a room filled with light. You feel a sense of peace and tranquility, as if you have finally found what you were looking for. 

[1]: [Embrace the light] 
[2]: [Wake up]
title: EyesClosed

body:
[Forbearance]: "Do yourself a favor and stop. We both know this place is not real. It's time to face the consequences and wake up. You've done well, I believe in you. We can do it." 

[1]: [Wake up]
title: Embrace

body:
[Eloquence]: You open your eyes again, and the darkness is still there. This is for real now. 

[Forbearance]: There is no end. 

[Clairvoyance]: The time to face the consequences arrive. 

 [Resonance]: "We can do this."

[1]: [Face the consequences]
title: WakeUp

body:
[Matilda]: "In last night's dream, it appeared. A shining, glistening sign. I touched it. Will you?" A voice echoes in your mind. It is not human. Your body reacts accordingly: you are terrified by the beast before your eyes. 

[1]: "Who are you?" 
[2]: [Ignore the voice]
title: Fate

body:
[Matilda]: "You need not to speak if you wish. We are one." The voice echoes in your mind once again. *It* knows you're trying to ignore it; almost as if it's inside your mind. 

[1]: "Who are you?"
title: Ignore

body:
[Matilda]: "You know who I am. We have met before. Just outside the pilgrim's door. Honestly, we both knew you had insufficient schemes." 

[1]: "Are you the one who stole my memories?" 
[2]: "What do you want from me?" 
[3]: "What do you mean by 'insufficient schemes'?"
title: Who

body:
[Matilda]: "You have been chosen. You have been marked. You have been blessed. You have been cursed. You have been given a gift. You have been given a burden. You have been given a chance. Yet you threw it all away at the funeral march." 

[1]: "Funeral march?" 
[2]: "What curse?" 
[3]: "What burden?" 
[4]: "What chance?"
title: Schemes

body:
[Matilda]: "You still don't understand..." 

[1]: "Give me my memories back!"
title: FuneralMarch

body:
[Matilda]: "A curse, a gift, a burden, what's the difference? It always comes down to the hunters' helper to clean up after these sorts of messes." 

[1] "What burden!?"
[2]: "Who am I? What did you do to my memories?"
title: Curse

body:
[Matilda]: "Convenience is poison. One must accustom themselves to pursue any intention as soon as it appears, regardless of difficulty. Otherwise one burns out, gives in to doubt, starts fearing oneself. The bolder the dream, the more surely it becomes dust when the moment is lost. You, however, drank the poison. You were the one responsible for this mess!" 

[1]"What do you want from me?"
[2]: "What happened to my memories?"
title: Burden

body:
[Matilda]: "You had the chance to do things right... You are a slave of the inevitable, while I am its mistress. The past is immutable, the future, unavoidable. However, the lines between both may be cut. Any line can be reattached with greater effort. There are consequences, however; burdens.‚Äù " 

[1]: "What burden?" 
[2]"What do you want from me?"
[3]: "What happened to my memories?"
title: Chance

body:
[Matilda]: "Want? I want nothing from you anymore." The cockroach-like eldritch beast speaks arrogantly. "You have served your purpose. You have become what you were meant to be." 

[1]: "Did you take my memories from me?" 
[2]: "What purpose?"
title: WhatWant

body:
[Matilda]: "You haven't yet figured out why you feel the way you fell? Why no one can recall yuor name? Do you really believe no one in this dammed place knows your name?" 

[1]: [Listen]
title: Purpose

body:
[Matilda]: "I didn't take or steal your memories! YOU were the one who came to me, begging for my assistance. I simply made an offer, and you simply accepted it." 

[1]: "What offer?" 
[2]: "What did you do to my memories?"
title: Memories

body:
[Matilda]: "Does that matter? You gave them away, so why bother figuring it out. You should've asked before." 

[1]: "What offer did I take?"
title: WhatHappenedMemories

body:
[Matilda]: "Well, you came to me desperate, asking for solutions. You had an 'assignment' due the next day. 'Assignment', is that how you call those things? It matters not to me, what matters is, you needed a wish grant..." 

[1]: [Listen]
title: Offer1

body:
[Matilda]: "I myself, am not a genie, but a *Feedbacker*. For me, every action produces a reaction. You were desperate to finish that 'assignment' you call; I only helped you." 

[1]: "You fooled me!"
title: Offer2

body:
[Matilda]: "I did not. You were aware of the consequences. You knew, yet you exchanged something for something else. Was it worth it? Did I make you happy?" 

[1]: "It couldn't be going worse!" 
[2]: "I want my memories back!" 
[3]: "Of course it wasn't worth it. An assignment for my memories? That's not fair!"
title: Offer3
